version_description:
I know it's hard to insist, but it must be cool.

Don't just give up the good habit of keeping a diary!

New:
• Added the ability to randomly place images.
• the color of the date on the front page will be automatically adapted to the current theme color in ios13, so it will no longer be hard to see.
Fixed:
• Fixed an ISSUE with ious when copying text.
• Fixed an issue where pictures were too long to share.
• Optimize icloud storage.
• Extend the launch copy to 5S.
